page.title: 02Health in Barrhead
page.content: Barrhead is well catered for in the area of health.We are lucky to have a new{health centre.}As well as doctors' surgeries the centre runs other clinics needed by the public. These{clinics}include family planning,chiropody,ante and post natal units. There are four{dentists}currently working in the town and in this age of realising how important it is to care for teeth, they are kept very busy. The health of the{handicapped}is further cared for by a day centre which provides care and suitable work for both mentally and physically handicapped people.
